remarks:
Zero is a natural number.  One of Peano's five postulates for arithmetic. Proposition 7.30(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 42.  Note:  Unlike most textbooks, our proofs of ~ peano1 through ~ peano5 do not use the Axiom of Infinity.  Unlike Takeuti and Zaring, they also do not use the Axiom of Regularity.  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1994.)
